question: Posted By Med Help on March 12, 1999 at 17:19:37:In Reply to: Diabetes posted by Teresaa on March 04, 1999 at 20:01:13:Hi, my name is Teresa and I have an 8 year old son.  My son has excessivethirst, along with frequent urination (he wets the bed almost every night).He complains of headaches, not all the time but maybe once a week.  He eatsa lot of food, especially sweets (he weights 92 pounds).  My question iswhat are the signs of diabetes in children??  My grandmother had diabetesand so did a distant aunt.  If you have any information would you pleasehelp.Thanks,TeresaDear Teresa;We have many articles about this online.. please search our library.PhilMed Help
title: Re: Diabetes
